text: `cudaGraphicsResource` `cudaGraphicsGLRegisterBuffer` etc aren't currently wrapped in CUDA.jl, are they?

elements.text: etc aren't currently wrapped in CUDA.jl, are they?

text: no, only the driver API is. so use cuGraphicsGLRegisterBuffer, which is available through the Clang wrappers, but not with high-level wrappers (yet)

elements.text: no, only the driver API is. so use cuGraphicsGLRegisterBuffer, which is available through the Clang wrappers, but not with high-level wrappers (yet)
